material_linear_advance_enable.label: Enable Linear Advance
material_linear_advance_enable.description: Enables adjusting the linear advance factors in the g-code.

material_linear_advance_factor.label: Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor.description: Sets the advance extrusion factor for Linear Advance. A value of '0' means no linear advance compensation is applied.

material_linear_advance_factor_infill.label: Infill Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_infill.description: The Linear Advance Factor used when printing infill. A value of '0' means no linear advance compensation is applied for this feature.

material_linear_advance_factor_wall.label: Wall Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_wall.description: The Linear Advance Factor used when printing walls. A value of '0' means no linear advance compensation is applied for this feature.

material_linear_advance_factor_wall_0.label: Outer Wall Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_wall_0.description: The Linear Advance Factor used when printing the outermost wall. A value of '0' means no linear advance compensation is applied for this feature.

material_linear_advance_factor_wall_x.label: Inner Wall Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_wall_x.description: The Linear Advance Factor used when printing all inner walls. A value of '0' means no linear advance compensation is applied for this feature.

material_linear_advance_factor_topbottom.label: Top/Bottom Skin Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_topbottom.description: The Linear Advance Factor used when printing top/bottom skin layers. A value of '0' means no linear advance compensation is applied for this feature.

material_linear_advance_factor_support.label: Support Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_support.description: The Linear Advance Factor used when printing support structures. A value of '0' means no linear advance compensation is applied for this feature.

material_linear_advance_factor_support_i.label: Support Interface Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_support_i.description: The Linear Advance Factor used when printing support interfaces. A value of '0' means no linear advance compensation is applied for this feature.

material_linear_advance_factor_prime_tow.label: Prime Tower Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_prime_tow.description: The Linear Advance Factor used when printing the prime tower. A value of '0' means no linear advance compensation is applied for this feature.

material_linear_advance_factor_skirt_bri.label: Skirt/Brim Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_skirt_bri.description: The Linear Advance Factor used when printing adhesion skirts or brims. A value of '0' means no linear advance compensation is applied for this feature.
material_linear_advance_factor_skirt_bri.enabled: resolveOrValue('material_linear_advance_enable') and (resolveOrValue('adhesion_type') == 'skirt' or resolveOrValue('adhesion_type') == 'brim' or resolveOrValue('draft_shield_enabled') or resolveOrValue('ooze_shield_enabled'))

material_linear_advance_factor_layer_0.label: Initial Layer Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_layer_0.description: The Linear Advance Factor used when printing the first layer. A value of '0' means no linear advance compensation is applied for this feature.
